mapper.select: select a.res_code, a.res_title, a.res_option, a.res_date, a.res_extra, b.user_name from tbl_res a join tbl_user b on (a.user_code = b.user_code)
SELECT a.res_code, a.res_title, a.res_option, a.res_date, a.res_extra, b.user_name FROM tbl_res a JOIN tbl_user b ON (a.user_code = b.user_code) WHERE a.res_code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_res ( res_title, user_code, res_option, res_date, res_extra ) VALUES ( #{ title }, #{ userCode }, #{ resoption }, #{ date }, #{ detailinfo } )
INSERT INTO tbl_res_reply (res_code, res_reply_content, res_time, user_code) VALUES ( #{ rescode }, #{ comment }, #{ date }, #{ usercode } )
mapper.select: select a.res_reply_content, a.res_time, a.res_code, b.user_name, b.user_code from tbl_res_reply a join tbl_user b on a.user_code = b.user_code WHERE a.res_code = #{ resCode } ORDER BY res_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_res SET RES_OPTION = #{ fixOption }, RES_DATE = #{ date }, RES_EXTRA = #{ extra } WHERE RES_CODE = #{ resCode }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_res WHERE res_code = #{ resCode }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb3 ( tbl_file ) VALUES ( #{ file } )
